content: **revised version for my 10th anniversary year ** this was the first pattern i ever published easy to knit and you get a decent size with a single skein of either of the 2 recommended yarns it s a perfect pick-up/put-down project - just 4 row and only 1 of them is patterning but with striping yarn it s actually hard to put down so is a great way to knit up a scarf quickly many thanks to jchan8 /people/jchan8 for testing the new version and for the beautiful photo
